io.sphere.internal

Class CategoryTreeRebuildService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.common.util.concurrent.AbstractScheduledService
      • io.sphere.internal.CategoryTreeRebuildService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.google.common.util.concurrent.Service

    public class CategoryTreeRebuildService
extends com.google.common.util.concurrent.AbstractScheduledService
    Scheduler to rebuild a category tree stored in cache. It is recommended to call the AbstractScheduledService.stopAsync() method on application shutdown.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class com.google.common.util.concurrent.AbstractScheduledService
